Posts.Content: Oct 13, 2008 10:10AM x_snow_white_X wrote: hi my name is jade ive just had diep 3weeks ago (double mastectomy n reconstruction wiv tummy fat) um 22 years old i had this done due 2 a gene i inherited off my mother (brca1) ive found out today im pregnant !! what a shock, im now in a situation where im not sure if my tummy can deal with carrying a child im vey early on and very confused as to what to do ???? if anyone has any info or has been preganant soon after/during surgery please let me know thanks x
Posts.Title: Preventive Mastectomy and Reconstruction DVSB DVSB
